diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Ergonomics.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    Ergonomics[Ergonomics] --> Field1[Psychology]
    Ergonomics --> Field2[Engineering]
    Ergonomics --> Integration[Integration Areas]
    psychology --> psychologySub1[Theory]
    psychology --> psychologySub2[Practice]
    engineering --> engineeringSub1[Theory]
    engineering --> engineeringSub2[Practice]
    Integration --> Methods[Research Methods]
    Integration --> Applications[Applications]
